participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
my favorite color is pruple.
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.

participant_2.background:
I'm not ready to tell my family about my sexuality.
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.
I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.
i have a dog.

content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
Great, it's a beautiful morning. I love the sunrises in my city.
Me too, they really are something special. Are you ready for the week?
I am, I have a lot to do but I'm excited for it.
What are you looking forward to the most?
I have a marathon coming up, I'm really nervous but excited to see if I can beat my time from last year.
I like to read, I collect children's books. I also like to go for walks with my dog.
That sounds really nice, I love taking my dog for walks too. What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorites, but I think I would have to say The Chronicles of Narnia. I love the way they combine fantasy and adventure.
I've heard good things about those, I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should, they're great books.
I think I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem, I'm always happy to talk about books.
